attributes.action: Fetch in a Australia-style points system regarding employment of migrants.
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that any country that cares about it's native people would wish to protect jobs for those born/brought up in that country.

It is estimated that about 75% of all UK jobs go to migrants with that figure even higher with manual/unskilled jobs.
attributes.background: I would like to see Britain bring in an Australia style points system so that only migrants who have qualifications for which there is a recognised shortage (ie doctors, nurses etc) are able to work in the UK.
